name: I Bermuda
description:
I Bermuda was my compo-entry for Ludum Dare #31

It´s quite unfinished, unpolished and unbalanced.

In I Bermuda it´s your goal to lure as many ships into the Bermuda triangle using your power of controlling the storms. Once they are trapped within the triangle, suck them in to the portal of destruction to score points and gain some extra time!
